items.title: AI-Powered Product Recommendation Engine
items.description: Implement a recommendation engine that uses AI algorithms to suggest products to users based on their browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System displays at least 5 relevant product recommendations on the homepage for logged-in users.
Recommendations update dynamically based on recent user activity within 1 minute.
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% click-through rate in A/B testing compared to baseline.
non_functional: System scales to 1 million concurrent users

notes: User input did not specify detailed functional scope beyond AI recommendations; assumed core e-commerce platform exists and focus is on recommendation feature.
